Name: HyperNova
About the game: A 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you advance by defeating enemies in a world where everything is made of voxels. Defeat enemies, collect reinforcement items, and take on powerful enemies that appear one after another! More than 12 BGM songs are included in the game. The screen switches from stage to stage with unique bosses and gimmicks. It is a simple game with a lot of depth. Main Features . Retro graphics Wide variety of enemies and gimmicks Stages that stimulate a sense of adventure Different background music for each stage [Items scattered throughout the stages. Powerful bosses await you in each stage. Heated Score Attacks! Controls . Keyboard. Movement : Arrow keys, W,A,S,D keys Firing : Z key Menu : Escape Decide : Enter key, Space key, Z key Low speed movement : Shift key Use item : X key Gamepad Movement ：Left key Movement : Left stick Fire : A button Decide : A button Menu ： Menu button Use item : LB Powered by 'CRIWARE'.CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
